org.coniks.coniks_test_client

Class ClientUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.ClientUtils

  • public class ClientUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements various utility functions used by various components of a CONIKS client.

    • Field Summary

        public static final int HASH_SIZE_BITS
        The size of the Merkle tree hashes in bits. Current hashing algorithm: SHA-256
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int HASH_SIZE_BYTES
        The size of the Merkle tree hashes in bytes. Current hashing algorithm: SHA-256
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SIG_SIZE_BYTES

        public static final int SIG_SIZE_BYTES
        The size of the CONIKS server's STR signatures in bytes. Expected server signature scheme: RSAwithSHA256.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        The maximum number of bytes logged per log file.

    • Method Detail

      • hash

        public static byte[] hash(byte[] input)
        Generates the cryptographic hash of input. Current hashing algorithm: SHA-256.
        Returns:
        The hash as a byte[] or null in case of an error.

      • hashChildren

        public static byte[] hashChildren(byte[] left,
                                  byte[] right)
        Generates the cryptographic hash of the left and right subtree hashes of a Merkle tree node. This is really just a wrapper around hash(byte[]).
        Returns:
        The hash as a byte[] or null in case of an error.

      • bytesToHex

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes)
        Converts a byte[] into a String of its hexadecimal representation.
        Returns:
        The hex representation of bytes as a String.

      • strToBytes

        public static byte[] strToBytes(java.lang.String str)
        Converts a UTF-8 String str to an array of bytes.

      • unameToIndex

        public static byte[] unameToIndex(java.lang.String username)
        Converts a username to a CONIKS lookup index using a verifiable unpredicctable function (VUF). Current VUF algorithm: SHA-256.
        Returns:
        The byte[] representation of the lookup index.

      • longToBytes

        public static byte[] longToBytes(long val)
        Converts a long val into an array of bytes.
        Returns:
        The byte[] representation of the long value.

      • getNthBit

        public static boolean getNthBit(byte[] arr,
                                int offset)
        Finds the byte in the byte array arr at offset offset, and determines whether it is 1 or 0.
        Returns:
        true if the nth bit is 1, false otherwise.

      • getPrefixBytes

        public static byte[] getPrefixBytes(byte[] arr)
        Gets the 16-bit prefix of a byte array arr.
        Returns:
        the first 16 bits of arr or all zeros if the length of the array is less than 2 bytes.

      • compareByteBuffers

        public static boolean compareByteBuffers(byte[] buf1,
                                         byte[] buf2)
        Compares two byte buffers for byte-by-byte equality.
        Returns:
        true if the buffers are identical, false otherwise.

      • convertDSAPubKey

        public static byte[] convertDSAPubKey(java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey pub)
        Converts a DSAPublicKey pub to a byte array.
        Returns:
        the DSA public key as a byte[] in g-p-q-y order

      • convertDSAPubKey

        public static byte[] convertDSAPubKey(C2SProtos.DSAPublicKeyProto pub)
        Converts a DSAPublicKeyProto pub to a byte array.
        Returns:
        the DSA public key protobuf as a byte[] in g-p-q-y order

      • buildDSAPublicKeyProto

        public static C2SProtos.DSAPublicKeyProto buildDSAPublicKeyProto(java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey pub)
        Converts a DSAPublicKeyProto protobuf pub to a DSAPublicKey.
        Returns:
        the DSAPublicKeyProto

      • buildDSAPublicKeyProto

        public static C2SProtos.DSAPublicKeyProto buildDSAPublicKeyProto(java.math.BigInteger p,
                                                                 java.math.BigInteger q,
                                                                 java.math.BigInteger g,
                                                                 java.math.BigInteger y)
        Builds a DSAPublicKeyProto protobuf from a DSA publick key p, q, g and y parameters.
        Returns:
        the DSAPublicKeyProto

      • ulnProtoToBytes

        public static byte[] ulnProtoToBytes(C2SProtos.AuthPath.UserLeafNode uln)
        Converts an AuthPath.UserLeafNode protobuf uln to a byte[].

      • computeInteriorNodeProtoHashes

        public static byte[] computeInteriorNodeProtoHashes(byte[] ulnHash,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<C2SProtos.AuthPath.InteriorNode> inList)
        Takes the hash of a user leaf node ulnHash and recomputes the hashes of each given interior node on the authentication path inList up to the root's left or right child and returns this hash

      • rootProtoToBytes

        public static byte[] rootProtoToBytes(byte[] authPathHash,
                                      C2SProtos.AuthPath.RootNode root)
        Takes the hash authPathHash computed from an authentication path and incorporates it into the root node root of an AuthPath.RootNode protobuf. Returns this root node as a byte[].
